Fault.name: BPEL/CalcBPEL.bpel
Fault.fix: Make sure that value "client:CalcBPELRequestMessage" is resolvable (check imports, value of "messageType").
Fault.msg: "messageType" is set to "client:CalcBPELRequestMessage" on this <bpel:variable> but it cannot be resolved (check value of "messageType", imports, WSDLs or XSDs).

Fault.name: BPEL/CalcBPEL.bpel
Fault.fix: Check the bpel:variable specified on this activity via attribute "variable" and make sure it is itself specified correctly.
Fault.msg: The activity <bpel:receive> refers to a bpel:variable (via the attribute "variable") - this bpel:variable needs to be defined correctly.

Fault.name: BPEL/CalcBPEL.bpel
Fault.fix: Check value of operation ("process") and portType "client:CalcBPEL".
Fault.msg: No "wsdl:input" message exist on portType "client:CalcBPEL" with operation "process".
